attributes.action: Make bottled water illegal to sell.
attributes.additional_details: I need not add any additional evidence or background information here. Everyone knows this to be the truth.
attributes.background: Plastic pollution is one of the largest pollution problems that we face. We live in a country where all of the tap water is drinkable, we do not need bottled water. To make bottled water illegal would be an easy way to stop millions of plastic bottles a year entering the environment.
